job.title: Software Engineer
job.description:
Skycart is currently looking for a Software Development Engineer to join our team.
We're a drone hardware/software and logistics company currently working on COVID-19 vaccine and other medical supply deliveries.
We're looking to expand to last-mile e-commerce deliveries globally throughout the next several years. We're in the process of a funding round right now on a platform called Wefunder, and we've had a decent amount of investment from a few angels already without ever launching publicly. The compensation to start off for this role will be in equity shares, however, given that is a part-time role, you are welcome to be working in an external role to Skycart. If this sounds interesting to you, go ahead and drop your resume in the chat, and our Head of Software, Stephen Enright will proceed with the next steps.
Full-stack app development experience is a plus.
Worked on mobile apps
Worked on backend (cloud) software
Experience with drones preferable
Worked on relevant projects
Must know: Go (or golang), Java, React and Android development
Knowledge in: C,C++,C#, Python, Golang (GO), Java, REST API, Android development kit, React, Flutter, Elastic Search, Microservices, Security
